question: The reign of Chandragupta II began in which of the following years?
explanation: The reign of Chandragupta II began inÂ  376 A.D. and lasted till 413/15 A.D. It is believed that Chandragupta II had to kill his brother Ramagupta and marry his wife, Dhruvadevi, to safeguard the honour of the Gupta dynasty.
